text:
Opencare | Full-Stack, Front-end & Data Science | Toronto | Onsite

Backend Stack: Node, Sails, Python, PostgreSQL, Redshift, Redis, Memcache, AWS

Frontend Stack: AngularJS, React, Handlebars

We’re a passionate (and rapidly growing) group of rule-breakers that are overhauling the $129bn dental industry. We recently closed a $22m Series A, and are looking for full-stack & front-end engineers, as well as and the founding member of our Data Science team.

We’re obsessed with our culture! No bureaucracy, no busy work, no box - just endless opportunity to do meaningful and impactful work, and all of the resources and support necessary to get you there.

Working at Opencare comes with a full suite of awesome perks, including access to a performance psychologist, top of the market compensation, equity, unlimited vacation, and lots more (learn all about it at https://www.opencare.com/careers).

If you’re interesting in learning more, you can reach me at ronen+hn@opencare.com.
